Method Detail

all

public Set<Check> all()
Get full collection of checks.

Checks should be ordered by their complexity. Most simple and fast checks should go first, in order to fail build faster. Most heavy and slow checks should be at the end of the list.

Returns:
List of checks

setTest

public void setTest(String scope)
Sets the scope of tests to execute.

Parameters:
scope - Pattern of test name

setCheck

public void setCheck(String chck)
Sets the scope of tests to execute.

Parameters:
chck - Name of the check class of the check to perform.
